extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.io.InputStream getFile​(java.lang.String path)
      Attempts to retrieve a InputStream representation of a file as seen from the client's class loader resource path.
      static byte[] getFileAsBytes​(java.lang.String path)
      Attempts to retrieve a byte[] representation of a file as seen from the client's class loader resource path.

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public static java.io.InputStream getFile​(java.lang.String path)
        Attempts to retrieve a InputStream representation of a file as seen from the client's class loader resource path.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to a file accessible through the client class loader
        Returns:
        a InputStream representation of the file passed

      • getFileAsBytes

        public static byte[] getFileAsBytes​(java.lang.String path)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Attempts to retrieve a byte[] representation of a file as seen from the client's class loader resource path.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to a file accessible through the client class loader
        Returns:
        a byte[] representation of a file accessible through the client class loader, or an empty array if the file does not exist
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if reading the file failed
